main event: On April 6, 1967, Mr. Stanley Frazier observed an unidentified flying object in the sky over his property in Salem, Virginia.
interesting points: The object was described as a large round, glowing object with a halo of light around it,The object was followed by Mr. Frazier for several miles while moving at a slow speed and making no sound,An investigator interviewed Mr. Frazier but no corroborating witnesses were found,Photographic evidence was sought but was unsuccessful, The case remains classified as UNIDENTIFIED with no confirmed identification.
sighted object: a large round glowing object with a halo
witness description: Mr. Stanley Frazier, a local resident
